name: Kamal Pasha
review: I have had this laptop only a day, but so far I think it is super. It replaces a 4 year old XPS 13. The Gram is light years ahead of it in terms of speed. No comparison. I love the fingerprint reader also.

name: Sumi Aktar
review: This is a great Chromebook for a middle to highschooler. It has a real long battery life charges quickly, and maintains a strong wireless signal. The touchscreen is very responsive and we haven’t had any problems with it at all. It has a very comfortable keyboard.

name: Sokina Bibi
review: I really like this model because it’s super-light and durable. It has very long battery life so I’m taking this laptop to every where. Definitely recommend to everyone

name: Salman Khan
review: I love this laptop. It is super light. It fits in 12.8 inch case. It is really small. The display is superb and the processor is like a rocket

name: Kalimulla Ahmed
review: I bought mine from Micro Center. It's a great machine and I enjoyed it, until the screen frequently went black. And last night it bit the bucket. It didn't turn back on. This could just be a simple PC tech 1-2-3 fixit situation, but with the money I spent I am returning it.
